mapper.sql: rec_id, member_id, target_money, finished_money, online_goods_count, add_time, refund_rate, complain_rate, send_speed, avg_desccredit, neg_eval_rate, avg_servicecredit, avg_deliverycredit, channel, latest_refund_rate, latest_complain_rate, latest_send_speed
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sy_agent_stats
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sy_agent_stats (member_id, target_money, finished_money, online_goods_count, add_time, refund_rate, complain_rate, send_speed, avg_desccredit, neg_eval_rate, avg_servicecredit, avg_deliverycredit, channel, latest_refund_rate, latest_complain_rate, latest_send_speed) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finishedMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onlineGoodsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refundRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{complainRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sendSpeed,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{avgDesccredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{negEvalRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{avgServicecredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{avgDeliverycredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latestRefundRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latestComplainRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latestSendSpeed,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.select: select rec_id from sy_agent_stats where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and add_time > #{nowTime} order by rec_id desc limit 1
